EmailTemplate.subject: Keep that face-to-face teller service…at the ITM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Keep that Face-to-Face Interaction – at the ITM ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Due to the coronavirus, it can be challenging for financial institutions to offer face-to-face interaction with customers while enabling social distancing.
But one technology that makes it possible in the new normal for banking, is the Interactive Teller Machine or ITM.
With ITMs, {{company.Company Name:default=your}} customers can speak to a teller via two-way video, providing a visual connection, but in a much lower-contact way. An ITM also enables your tellers to work remotely—helping you keep business continuity at a critical time.
From reducing wait times and expanding hours to migrating routine, expensive transactions to the self-service channel, they’re fast becoming a key differentiator in a market facing unusual circumstances. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
